segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy perched precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand right in there, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see its legs are splayed, and it's leaning backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard floor could be serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, eagerly anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a daring plan, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their stealth is impressive, considering the woman is so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be enjoying their forbidden snack.
segments.speaker: PAR
